overview: Seong-min, who has decided to go home, asks his friend Jin-woo to take him to Taeungsa, the temple of celibacy. When they are ready to leave, Seong-min repeatedly says “I’m going home today” to the people he meets, expressing his will to go home. However, when Seong-min gets to the Taewoongsa Temple, he is rejected for absurd reasons. As a result, the movie that Jinwoo was preparing for is overturned. You cannot go or stay. The two friends set off for another journey.
title: Leave Home
